document_data.caption: A map of northwest Eltabbar showing the Orc's Beard.
document_data.name: The Orc's Beard
document_data.mainbody: The '''Orc's Beard''' was a [[tavern]] located in the city of [[Eltabbar]] in [[Thay]] during the mid-to-late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].{{Cite interactive atlas|4101 Eltabbar}}
document_data.Location: The Orc's Beard was located in the northwest section of the city adjacent to the entrance of the Wizard's Gate. A single building separated the Orc's Beard from the [[River Eltar]].
